<script type="text/javascript">

function applyCouponCode()
   {
	   $.ajax({
		url: 'index.php?route=product/product/coupon/en',
		type: 'post',
		data: 'coupon=' + encodeURIComponent($('input[name=\'coupon\']').val()),
		dataType: 'json',
		beforeSend: function() {
			$('#button-coupon').button('loading');
		},
		complete: function() {
			$('#button-coupon').button('reset');
		},
		success: function(json) {
			$('.alert').remove();

			if (json['error']) {
				$('.clscouponnotification').html('<div class="alert alert-danger"><i class="fa fa-exclamation-circle"></i> ' + json['error'] + '</div>');

				//$('html, body').animate({ scrollTop: 0 }, 'slow');
			}

			if (json['redirect']) {
				location = json['redirect'];
			}
		}
	});
   }
 
 function removeCouponCode()
   {
	   $.ajax({
		url: 'index.php?route=product/product/removecoupon/en',
		type: 'post',
		data: '',
		dataType: 'json',
		beforeSend: function() {
			$('#button-remove').button('loading');
		},
		complete: function() {
			$('#button-remove').button('reset');
		},
		success: function(json) {
			$('.alert').remove();

			if (json['error']) {
				$('.clscouponnotification').html('<div class="alert alert-danger"><i class="fa fa-exclamation-circle"></i> ' + json['error'] + '</div>');

				//$('html, body').animate({ scrollTop: 0 }, 'slow');
			}

			if (json['redirect']) {
				location = json['redirect'];
			}
		}
	});
   }  
</script>

function showQty()
{

}

function clearCart()
{
   $.ajax({
		url: 'index.php?route=checkout/cart/clearcart/en',
		type: 'post',		
		beforeSend: function() {
			$('#clsRecentList').html('<img src="catalog/view/theme/default/image/processing.gif" />');
		},
		success: function(data) {
			//$('#clsRecentList').html(data);
			window.location.reload();
		}
	});
}

function clearCookie()
{
   $.ajax({
		url: 'index.php?route=product/product/clearCookie/en',
		type: 'post',		
		beforeSend: function() {
			$('#clsRecentList').html('<img src="catalog/view/theme/default/image/processing.gif" />');
		},
		success: function(data) {
			$('#clsRecentList').html(data);
		}
	});
}

 var myVar = setInterval(myTimer, 100);

function myTimer() {
  $( ".lazyloadimage" ).each(function( index ) {
   
    path = $( this ).attr('data-original');
    $(this).attr('src', path);
    $(this).removeClass('lazyloadimage');
  });
} 


$("document").ready( function() {
  $( ".lazyloadimage" ).each(function( index ) {
    
    path = $( this ).attr('data-original');
    $(this).attr('src', path);
    $(this).removeClass('lazyloadimage');
  });
  
  $(window).on('wheel', function(e) {
    $( ".lazyloadimage" ).each(function( index ) {
        
        path = $( this ).attr('data-original');
        $(this).attr('src', path);
        $(this).removeClass('lazyloadimage');
    });
  });
  
  $('body').on('mousewheel', function(e){
    $( ".lazyloadimage" ).each(function( index ) {
       
        path = $( this ).attr('data-original');
        $(this).attr('src', path);
        $(this).removeClass('lazyloadimage');
    });
  });
  
});



</script>
